keyMoments.title: Luffy Meets Princess Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Luffy accidentally stumbles into Hard-Shell Tower and meets Princess Shirahoshi for the first time, discovering she is a giant smelt-whiting mermaid.
keyMoments.significance: The first meeting between Luffy and Shirahoshi that begins their friendship and sets in motion her liberation from imprisonment.
keyMoments.quote: You're HUGE! And you're crying? What's wrong?

keyMoments.title: Saved from Vander Decken's Axe
keyMoments.description: Luffy saves Shirahoshi from Vander Decken's giant axe that crashed through her tower wall, demonstrating his protective nature.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the trust between Luffy and Shirahoshi and shows the constant danger she faces.
keyMoments.quote: Don't worry! I won't let it hurt you!

keyMoments.title: Reveals 10 Years of Imprisonment
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi reveals to Luffy that she has been locked in Hard-Shell Tower for 10 years due to Vander Decken's threats.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the tragic extent of Shirahoshi's suffering and isolation, explaining her timid personality.
keyMoments.quote: I have been in this tower for 10 years... I cannot leave because he keeps sending weapons to kill me.

keyMoments.title: Confesses Her Dream to See the World
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi confesses her dream to see many places and experience the world outside her tower.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Shirahoshi's inner strength and desire for freedom despite her fearful nature.
keyMoments.quote: I... I want to see so many places! I want to go outside!

relationships.description: Luffy befriends Shirahoshi after saving her from Vander Decken's axe and promises to help her see the world outside her tower.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy saves Shirahoshi from the axe and she hides him from palace guards, establishing mutual trust.

relationships.description: Vander Decken has been obsessively pursuing Shirahoshi for over 10 years, threatening to kill her if she refuses to marry him.

evolutionMoments.description: Vander Decken throws a giant axe at Shirahoshi, demonstrating his willingness to kill her.

relationships.description: Shirahoshi is the daughter of King Neptune and the princess of the Ryugu Kingdom.

reveals.information: Princess of the Ryugu Kingdom and a giant smelt-whiting mermaid
Has been imprisoned in Hard-Shell Tower for 10 years due to Vander Decken's threats
Timid, emotional, and cries easily, earning her the description 'weakling crybaby' from Luffy
Wants to see many places and experience the world outside her tower

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Mark-Mark Fruit Powers Revealed
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken demonstrates his Mato Mato no Mi powers by throwing a giant axe that automatically targets Princess Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Vander Decken's Devil Fruit ability and the threat he poses to Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.quote: I will make you my wife, Princess Shirahoshi! If you refuse, then you shall die!

keyMoments.title: Forms Alliance with Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken meets with Hody Jones at Noah and forms an alliance to destroy Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the main antagonistic force of the Fish-Man Island Arc by combining Hody's military power with Decken's Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Together, we shall bring about the complete destruction of the Ryugu Kingdom!

abilities.description: Can mark targets by touching them with his bare hands, allowing any object he throws to automatically lock onto and chase the marked target.

relationships.description: Vander Decken is obsessively in love with Shirahoshi and has threatened to kill her if she refuses to marry him.

evolutionMoments.description: Throws a giant axe at Shirahoshi, demonstrating his obsession and willingness to kill her.

relationships.description: Forms an alliance with Hody Jones to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom and Fish-Man Island.

evolutionMoments.description: Meets Hody at Noah and forms an alliance to bring down the kingdom.

reveals.information: Possesses the Mato Mato no Mi (Mark-Mark Fruit) Devil Fruit powers
Obsessively pursues Shirahoshi and threatens to kill her if she refuses his marriage proposal

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Forms Alliance with Vander Decken IX
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones meets with Vander Decken IX at Noah and forms an alliance to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom and Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the main antagonistic alliance of the Fish-Man Island Arc, combining military force with Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.quote: Together, we shall bring about the complete destruction of the Ryugu Kingdom!

relationships.description: Forms an alliance with Vander Decken IX to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom, though the alliance is based on mutual benefit rather than true friendship.

evolutionMoments.description: Meets Vander Decken at Noah and forms an alliance to overthrow King Neptune.

reveals.information: Plans to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom and overthrow King Neptune
